meanings.definition: A sugar produced by the breakdown of starch, consisting of two linked glucose molecules.
meanings.sent1: The maltoses in the solution tasted sweet.
meanings.sent2: The baker used maltoses to make the cookies.
meanings.sent3: The maltoses in the beaker decided to have a party.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as sweet as maltoses on a summer day.
meanings.sent5: The scientist observed the maltoses under the microscope.

meanings.sent1: I bought two bags of maltoses from the store.
meanings.sent2: The recipe called for adding maltoses to the mixture.
meanings.sent3: The maltoses on the shelf seemed to be chatting with each other.
meanings.sent4: The field was covered in a blanket of golden maltoses.
meanings.sent5: The children enjoyed playing with the maltoses in the sandbox.
